snippet: Video and images posted online by Syrian activists appeared to show that anti-Islamist protesters took to the streets in the city of Aleppo and in rural areas near the Turkish border on Friday.
abstract: Video and images posted online by Syrian activists appeared to show that anti-Islamist protesters took to the streets in the city of Aleppo and in rural areas near the Turkish border on Friday.

headline.main: Syrians Protest Assad and Islamist Militants
